name: Uncaged
description:
Welcome to Uncaged.

Uncaged is a Virtual Reality experience created for a student project. Uncaged is based on the artwork " Caged" by Ezra Singh. Throughout the experience the player will feel a mixture of emotions, from audio to visual cues to interactive objects for the player to immerse themselves in the world. Enjoy Uncaged.

Download instructions:

Download Zip folder.

Unzip all contents in folder.

Open Uncaged EXE file to start experience.

Minimum Requirements:

Nvidia 1050Ti 6gb or greater.

Intel i3 1550 - Ryzen 3 1350x 

8gb of Ram or greater.

5gb of storage space.

VR headset - Experience tested on Oculus Rift S and Oculus Quest2 only.

Controls: 

Left thumb stick = turn left/turn right.

Right thumb stick = Teleport/move player forward.

Left/Right triggers = Grab. 

Left options button = wrist menu screen
